name: Aerial Banners, Inc.
about: Aerial Banners, Inc. is a renowned provider of aerial advertising and FAA-approved banner towing training. With over 32 years of experience, our company operates a fleet of more than 50 planes strategically located across the United States, including major cities like Miami, Fort Lauderdale, Tampa, New York City, Los Angeles, and Houston. We offer comprehensive banner towing training programs for commercial-rated pilots, ensuring compliance with FAR 91.113 and certification by a designated FAA examiner. Our training prepares pilots to work with any banner towing company worldwide. Aerial Banners, Inc. is dedicated to delivering effective aerial advertising solutions and rigorous pilot training, ensuring safety and professionalism in every aspect of our operations.
